entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h then light late in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:22 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
